abstract: Neil Genzlinger Critic’s Notebook commends Adult Swim animated series Rick and Morty, clever comedy about demented mad scientist, which begins its second season.
lead_paragraph: As this Adult Swim series opens a second season, Grandpa Rick’s mad-scientist move to stop time has bred chaos, replicating some of the characters in alternative realities.

headline.main: ‘Rick and Morty’ Returns to Destabilize the Universe
headline.print_headline: Mad-Scientist Grandpa’s Messy Wrinkle in Time

snippet: As this Adult Swim series opens a second season, Grandpa Rick’s mad-scientist move to stop time has bred chaos, replicating some of the characters in alternative realities.
